Author: GitHub
Title: The Download: GitHub Game Off, Universe 2025 & Octoverse report recap
Description:
This week on The Download, Christina Warren is back to recap the biggest news from GitHub Universe 2025, from Agent HQ to the Furbies. We also dive into the key findings from the 2025 Octoverse report. Then, we spotlight 'uv', an open-source tool that could replace pip, and kick off the GitHub Game Off 2025.

— CHAPTERS —

00:00 Welcome to The Download 00:59 GitHub Universe 2025: Furbies, Agent HQ & more 02:11 The 2025 Octoverse report is here 03:08 Inside the Open Source Zone at Universe 03:38 GitHub Game Off 2025 theme announced 04:18 Project spotlight: 'uv' (a new Python tool?) 05:35 This week's news recap

— RESOURCES — GitHub Universe recap video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HJddnaBy6YU

Introducing Agent HQ: Any agent, any way you work https://github.blog/news-insights/company-news/welcome-home-agents/

Octoverse: A new developer joins GitHub every second as AI leads TypeScript to https://github.com/githubevents/the-download/issues/1 https://github.blog/news-insights/octoverse/octoverse-a-new-developer-joins-github-every-second-as-ai-leads-typescript-to-1/

The OSS Zone at GitHub Universe Projects Appwrite, GoReleaser, Homebrew, Ladybird, Moondream, Oh My Zsh. Open Source Project Security Baseline, OpenCV, Processing Foundation, Pixi JS, Zulip, Spark.js

Game Off 2025 https://github.blog/company/github-game-off-2025-theme-announcement/ and Itch.io Page https://gameoff.github.com/

Project Spotlight: uv https://github.com/astral-sh/uv and docs.astral.sh/uv and Dr. Emily L. Hunt's blog https://emily.space/posts/251023-uv
